plugin.name: toggle_triggers
plugin.author: level
plugin.purpose: type toggletriggers to enable\disable all triggers

alias.send: local trigger_toggle = GetVariable("trigger_toggle") if trigger_toggle == "0" then SetVariable("trigger_toggle", "1") SaveState() SetOption ("enable_triggers", true) ColourNote ("green", "", "Triggers enabled.") else SetVariable("trigger_toggle", "0") SaveState() SetOption ("enable_triggers", false) ColourNote ("red", "", "Triggers disabled.") end
